description: This file defines a performance evaluation setup for an agent that responds in haiku form and includes a weather information function. It creates an agent instance and runs a performance evaluation with 1000 iterations.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent with specific instructions and tools.

classes.name: PerformanceEval
classes.description: Handles performance evaluation of a function over multiple iterations.

methods.name: get_weather
methods.description: Returns weather information for specified city ('nyc' or 'sf').

methods.name: instantiate_agent
methods.description: Creates and returns an agent configured to respond in haiku form with specified model and tools.
